ingredients.ingredient: 1 package mini sourdough pretzels or sourdough pretzels, broken into bite size pieces

cookingTips: Toss pretzels with oil-seasoning mixture thoroughly for even coating
Spread in a single layer on baking sheet to ensure consistent toasting
Bake at 250°F for 20-30 minutes, stirring every 8-10 minutes to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This snack mix is about achieving even seasoning distribution and the right level of crispness. How comfortable are you with low-temperature baking to toast without burning? Do you have experience tempering flavors in savory mixes?
